Mitsubishi LP Gas Forklift 4.0 – 5.5 tonnes

  1. Home
  2. LP GAS FORKLIFT
  3. Mitsubishi LP Gas Forklift 4.0 – 5.5 tonnes

Overview

Generations of forklift truck owners have grown to love and depend on the effectiveness and legendary reliability of our 4.0 – 5.0 tonne LPG trucks. After all, they’ve proved themselves over and over again in the most demanding of applications. And GRENDiA EX builds on those exceptional qualities.

  • 4.0 – 5.5 tonnes
  • LP Gas Counterbalance
  • 4 Wheel Pneumatic Tyres

Gallery

Specifications
